title: namminavaarini
sahitya:
Nammina vArini maracEdi nyAyamA rAma



anupallavi



 kammaviltuni gannna mA cakkani kalyANarAmA ninu



caraNam 1



 cinna nATanuNDi nI cittamurA nadu\ici ennarAni yUdigamu lEncucu pUjinci ninnu

   

caraNam 2



 Asaminci rAma nan-nantaranganuna nunci vAsi vAsi yanucucu varNincucu nentO ninnu

   

caraNam 3



bhOgamu landuvELa buddhi nIyeDa muncE tyAgarAja sannuta tAraka caritra ninnu
